name: NTPClient_Generic
keywords: timing, device, control, communication, protocol, iot, ntp, rtc, wifi, wi-fi, wifinina, ethernet, client, time
description: Library for NTPClient to connect to an NTP time-server. Get time from a NTP time-server and keep it in sync. For ESP8266/ESP32, nRF52, SAMD21/SAMD51, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, Teensy, etc. besides AVR, using ESP WiFi, WiFiNINA, Ethernet W5x00, ENC28J60, LAN8742A, ESP8266/ESP32 AT-command WiFi
